creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
I'm working on the integration of CodeMirror (http://marijn.haverbeke.nl/codemirror/) into the source editor.

I sent a mail to legal@apache re. the license compatibility.

Works with Firefox and Safari (most recent versions), needs to be tested with other browsers.

Created attachment 23182
Patch for the integration of CodeMirror.

Patch for the integration of CodeMirror. The software itself has to be downloaded and placed in src/modules/editors/resources/codemirror/0.60/.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: legal@apache say the license is comatible.
